IndexContent.Message: Hello and good day to you. Let's start by GET /help

HelpContent.Header: Welcome to FPTSoftware. Let's forget traditional CVs and talk to us using the same language you, as an engineer, use everyday.
HelpContent.Guildline:
Some of our operations require Token Authorization, which will be marked with a "*". See below of how to get them    

Here are some checklist items you might want to check:
ContentList: - We have junior, mid-level, senior open for hire. If you are interested, here are some steps:

- 1. Start by registering to apply for a position  ->  POST /register  
   By registering you will receive a confirmationCode. Note it down, it will be your password
Our services requires token to work with, please login to receive new token if current one expires
For help with Register -> GET help/register
For help with Login -> GET help/login
